description:
Saiga Shirogane is a French young woman who came to Japan to protect http://anidb.net/ch97028 [Masaru] and repay the debt she feels from Masaru`s http://anidb.net/ch98592 [grandfather] helping her family. She is also the puppeteer of http://anidb.net/ch98660 [Arlequin]. Despite being well over 90 years old, because of the Soft Stone in her, she has only aged for a fifth of her actual age.
Source: Karakuri Circus Wiki
name: Saiga Shirogane
